steps.title: Make sure that the sheet is double sided - one green side and one red side.
steps.content: Make sure that the sheet is double sided - one green side and one red side. Check if you have the right origami paper.

steps.title: Fold one corner diagonally to the another.
steps.content: Fold one corner diagonally to the another. Crease the fold.

steps.title: Take one corner on the creased side and fold it to the other corner on the same side.
steps.content: Take one corner on the creased side and fold it to the other corner on the same side. Crease the sides.

steps.title: Lift one side of the triangle and open up the triangle so it creates a diamond-like shape.
steps.content: Lift one side of the triangle and open up the triangle so it creates a diamond-like shape. Crease the sides.

steps.title: Turn over paper and repeat the previous step.
steps.content: Turn over paper and repeat the previous step. Remember to crease the sides.

steps.title: Turn the diamond-shaped origami paper around so that the opened folds are at the top and the closed corner is at the bottom.
steps.content: Turn the diamond-shaped origami paper around so that the opened folds are at the top and the closed corner is at the bottom.

steps.title: Fold one side of the diamond into the middle.
steps.content: Fold one side of the diamond into the middle. Do the same for the parallel side.

steps.title: Unfold the kite-shaped origami paper.
steps.content: Unfold the kite-shaped origami paper. It should look like a diamond with the open ends at the top.

steps.title: Put your index finger into the open end and slightly lift up one of the corners.
steps.content: Put your index finger into the open end and slightly lift up one of the corners. Fold the side corner inward. Do the same for the parallel side.

steps.title: Turn the folded origami over and repeat the process on this side as well.
steps.content: Turn the folded origami over and repeat the process on this side as well.

steps.title: Fold the side of the top of one corner of the kite-shaped origami towards the middle.
steps.content: Fold the side of the top of one corner of the kite-shaped origami towards the middle. Do the same for the parallel side, as well as the other three sides.

steps.title: Lift the top of the kite-shaped origami and fold it downward.
steps.content: Lift the top of the kite-shaped origami and fold it downward. Crease the fold. Repeat for all sides.

steps.title: Flip the origami to the sides that are fully red.
steps.content: Flip the origami to the sides that are fully red.

steps.title: Fold the upper corner to the middle.
steps.content: Fold the upper corner to the middle. Create a minor fold, not one that will extend to the side corner. Repeat for the other three sides.

steps.title: Fold two sides together so that the minor folds are inside and the leaves are at each corner.
steps.content: Fold two sides together so that the minor folds are inside and the leaves are at each corner.

steps.title: Blow into the hole that is at the top of the leaves.
steps.content: Blow into the hole that is at the top of the leaves.

steps.title: Refer to the image to see the final product.
steps.content: Refer to the image to see the final product.
